name: Mystery Case Files: Madame Fate®
description: Madame Fate™, a mysterious fortune teller, has foreseen her own demise at midnight this very day. She has asked for your help in investigating each quirky carnival worker to determine their whereabouts at midnight.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Vista Processor: 800 Mhz or better Memory: 512 MB RAM DirectX®: 7.0 Hard Drive: 116 MB of free space

reviews.review_text: If you like SeekNFind's and puzzle games, then I highly recommend all the Mystery Case Files. Madame Fate was just a personal favorite for me. (loved the creepy carnival atmosphere) I really enjoyed this one!
